reviews.review_msg: He is very knoledgable and passinate proffesor.

Takes in late assignments, as well as lenient grading on all assessments. Took accountability for low midterm avg applied a curve. Held 4 hour zoom meetings on the weekend to help students review for final exam. Occasionally funny, even made some jokes on midterm and final. Only gripe was that the organization of the course was messy and confusing.

Morteza's lectures were always very detailed and he clearly cares, always answering questions thoroughly. Grading has many parts (assignments, weekly work, project writeups), but all of these prepare you well for the final, and he grades leniently. We could choose any topic we wanted for the project with a presentation at the end. Highly recommend.

Awesome professor. Morteza is very caring and wants his students to do as well as possible. His workload is a little heavy at times with several assignments due in the latter half of the course but he adjusts assignments and exams slightly when he sees the class generally is struggling.
